body_html:
This time it works like magic!

Thanks a lot, this problem confuses me for at least two days...

Now I have built Tensorflow from source and I can do fine-tuning on Inception-V3 model!

body:
This time it works like magic! 

Thanks a lot, this problem confuses me for at least two days... 

Now I have built Tensorflow from source and I can do [fine-tuning on Inception-V3 model](https://github.com/tensorflow/models/blob/master/inception/README.md#how-to-fine-tune-a-pre-trained-model-on-a-new-task)!
